overview: Directer Pat Stone brings together eight young, testosterone-charged recruits for their introduction into military life...and more. They're put through rigorous training, with muscles straining and developing hard bodies -- and that's not all that's hard. Soon enough, they're bonding with each other in ways they might have never though of, and when you've got a woody...your buddies' mouths and tight asses look mighty good! Well, solve the issue with like-minded horny-ass buddies! Damn, they're all joining in!
title: Bareback Gangbang Recruits 1
